Question Type: from effect to cause without intervention
Explanation: When John transferred to Highschool B, he was removed from the students list of Highschool A. Hence, if he continues to be listed at Highschool A, it implies the transfer to Highschool B did not occur.
causal_map: school_a.enroll(self) → john.school; john.transfer(school_b) → school_b.students.contains(john); john.school ≠ school_b → john was not transferred to Highschool B
